#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int win[n],draw[n];
        int i=0;
        while(i<n)
        {
            scanf("%d",&win[i]);
            i++;
        }
        i=0;
        int temp,mx=0;
        while(i<n)
        {
            scanf("%d",&draw[i]);
            temp=win[i]*3+draw[i];
            if(temp>mx) mx=temp;
            i++;
        }
        printf("%d\n",mx);
    }
}
